CustomField.formula: IF( DMAPP__Is_Complete__c , 'Completed', IF( !ISBLANK(DMAPP__Start_Time__c) && ISBLANK(DMAPP__End_Time__c) , 'Started', IF( DMAPP__Effective_Date__c < BLANKVALUE($Setup.DMAPP__Dealmaker_Core_Settings__c.DMAPP__Mock_Today__c, TODAY()), 'Overdue', IF( ISNULL( DMAPP__Reschedule_Date__c )|| ISNULL(DMAPP__Original_Schedule_Date__c) && NOT(ISNULL(DMAPP__Reschedule_Date__c)), 'Scheduled', IF( DMAPP__Reschedule_Date__c <= DMAPP__Original_Schedule_Date__c, 'Rescheduled', 'Deferred' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
